Table of Contents

Link to the video

Under this link you will find video that shows how to automate import of data to dimension. Here you will find Documentation.

Step by step

  1. Create a table containing the columns you want to import into the dimension. The columns in the staging table must match the dimension table columns by name and data type:

  1. Create a Dataflow Item and add the Import dimension members task from the Dimension Tasks in the toolbox:

  1. Specify the name of the staging table and the name of the dimension:

  1. Create a Dataflow and run the Dataflow Item:
